synopsis.text: Rena Yukuhashi is an office worker who seems plain and reserved at the office. However, when she dresses up outside of work, she transforms into a stunning beauty. Her colleague Ryouhei Hachiya sees her transformation one day and is captivated by her beauty. On a pretense related to work, Ryouhei insists on taking Rena out after office hours. During their date, Ryouhei finds himself unexpectedly drawn to Rena's attractive yet uninhibited side. In a moment of passion, they end up in front of a love hotel. Rena and Ryouhei start a secret affair, finding intimacy in each other they have not experienced before. However, this causes complications for Ryouhei with his superior at work, to whom he tries to hide the relationship. As Rena and Ryouhei continue their trysts, Ryouhei becomes more captivated by Rena's passionate side that only he knows. The anime explores the development of an unexpected relationship between two office colleagues and the complications that arise.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
